title: Dr Kedir Ahmed
text:
Welcome
Hi! I’m Dr Kedir Ahmed, an epidemiologist and Health Data Scientist passionate about turning complex health data into actionable insights.



About Me

PhD in Epidemiology & Masters in Health Data Science and Public Health
Over 10 years experience in health data analysis and public health research

Strong background in health and medical sciences.

Expert in STATA, R, Python, SQL, and advanced data visualization




Contact

Email: kedirymam331@gmail.com

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/kedir-ahmed


 


Send Message

title: Dr Kedir Ahmed

title: Dr Kedir Ahmed
text: I am an epidemiologist and health data scientist with a clinical background and a PhD from Western Sydney University, Australia…

title: Dr Kedir Ahmed
text:
Research Fellow, Charles Sturt University, Orange Campus (2023–Present)
Conducting epidemiological and machine learning research in cardiometabolic health.
Clinical Practitioner, (insert hospital)
Delivered clinical care with a focus on chronic disease prevention and management.
Research Assistant, (insert institution)
Contributed to epidemiological research and data analysis projects.

title: Dr Kedir Ahmed
text:
Selected Projects

1. Predictive Modeling for Hospital Readmissions

Built an XGBoost model to predict 30-day hospital readmissions.

Improved prediction accuracy by 15% compared to baseline models.

Technologies: R, Python, Shiny, ggplot2



2. Cardiometabolic Risk Meta-Analysis

Conducted a meta-analysis on diabetes and CVD risk factors.

Generated forest plots and traffic-light risk of bias visualizations for publication.

Technologies: R (meta, ggplot2, cowplot)



3. Interactive Health Dashboard

Designed a Shiny app to visualize hospital ICU stay data.

Features interactive filtering and predictive outcomes.

Technologies: R, Shiny, Plotly

title: Dr Kedir Ahmed
text: Hi! I’m Dr Kedir Ahmed, an epidemiologist and Health Data Scientist passionate about turning complex health data into actionable insights. I specialise in epidemiological research, statstical modelling, machine learning, and data visualization.
